alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:31PM CDT until June 04 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JACKSON COUNTY... At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Skyline, or 15 miles northwest of Scottsboro, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Skyline, Hytop, Estillfork, Princeton, Larkin and Hollytree. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
